players.name: Alice
memory: Charlie: "I investigated Bob last night and he is the mafioso. We must vote him out today."
Bob: "I am the detective and I investigated Charlie last night. He is the mafioso, not me. Alice, trust me and vote Charlie."
Charlie: "Alice, Bob is lying. I am the detective and he is mafioso. My investigation result is the truth. Vote Bob to win."

Bob: "Alice, Charlie is lying. I investigated Diana last night, but she was killed. As detective, I couldn't investigate myself. Charlie claiming he investigated me proves he's mafia. Vote Charlie to win."
You: "I'm not sure who to trust. Charlie says Bob is mafioso, but Bob says Charlie is lying and himself the detective. Can someone here be investigated tonight?"
Votes: Alice voted for Charlie, Bob voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Bob
